description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding to be used as store; rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony; rear outrigger roof extension incorporating Juliet balcony; installation of one rooflight to the front roof slope; and installation of window to side elevation roofslope
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 2 0 - 1 0 C R 1 4; 2 0 - 1 0 C R 1 0; 2 0 - 1 0 C R 1 1; 2 0 - 1 0 C R 1 2; 2 0 - 1 0 C R 1 5; 2 0 - 1 0 C R 1 6; 2 0 - 1 0 C R 1 7; 2 0 - 1 0 C R 1 8; 2 0 - 1 0 C R 0 0; Planning Statement, received 20.01.2022
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4 and D5 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Any solar PV or solar thermal equipment installed on the roof of the subject dwellinghouse must adhere to the of provisions, limitation and conditions of Schedule 2, Part 14, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy D4 of the London Plan (2021).
